level.text: The Department shall test and certify, at least once every 3 months or as recommended by the manufacturer, whichever is more frequent, the accuracy of all equipment used by any District law enforcement personnel to test the alcohol content of breath.
Only equipment certified by the Department to be accurate shall be used by a District law enforcement agency to test the alcohol content of breath.

The Director may delegate by memorandum of agreement to the Office of the Chief Medical Examiner the responsibility for testing breath alcohol equipment and some or all of the responsibility for providing forensic science services pertaining to forensic alcohol.
